title: Nord Stream Sabotage: Kuznetsov’s Trial Poised to Shake Europe
description: The long-running legal saga surrounding the Nord Stream explosions took a dramatic step forward on Wednesday. Italy’s Corte di Cassazione ( Court of Cassation ) has rejected the final appeal lodged on behalf of Serhii Kuznetsov, the 49-year-old former Ukraini…
